data.title: Sovereign Order of Malta
data.text:
10/06/2024

Investiture and Celebratory Dinner 2024

Order of Malta, Singapore Investiture Mass and Celebratory Dinner on 18th May 2024 “Tuitio Fidei et Obsequium Pauperum” – Defence of the faith and service to the poor. This has been the motto of the Sovereign Order of Malta since its inception and on this day of ceremony rich with tradition and solemnity, three distinguished members-elect would pledge their commitment […]

06/04/2024

Lourdes Experience 2024

Save the Date! Join us on 7 December 2024 for the 5th Lourdes Experience at the Singapore Indoor Stadium. The event has been described as “uplifting”, “inspirational”, “a profound spiritual encounter” and more. More details about admission tickets will be shared in due course. Please bookmark this page for updates. We are looking forward to […]

06/04/2024

Information Session – 16 March 2024

Order of Malta. Singapore Information Session on 16 March 2024 “Our Lords, the sick and needy…” As part of a continuing work to foster a more informed and connected Catholic community to the works of the Order of Malta in Singapore, interested parties gathered on a Saturday afternoon for an enriching information session at the […]

23/11/2023

President Sergio Mattarella receives new Government of Sovereign Order of Malta on official visit

Appreciation expressed for the Order of Malta’s role in favour of peace and humanitarian diplomacy The delegation of the Sovereign Order of Malta, led by Grand Master Fra’ John T. Dunlap, was received today on an official visit to the Quirinal Palace by the President of the Italian Republic Sergio Mattarella. The meeting highlighted the […]
